item.title: Interface close problem
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

most servers display the actionbutton ID in the command prompt,

click your close button and it should say something like c4ll3r: [ationbutton]: ####

inthomemap.anIntArray240[14] = 10371; inthomemap.anIntArray241[14] = 490; inthomemap.anIntArray272[14] = 17; //Button addActionButton(10371, 275, 36, "close", "close");

item.title: Interface close problem
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

find the actionbutton ID,

go into clickingmost.java(for delta)

and add this:

Case ####
c.closeInterface();
break;

the #### being the actionbutton ID

Read full topic
